overview: As a secretary for lawyer Xander Corvus, Madison Ivy is disillusioned by conservative office life. She wants excitement, and so eavesdrops when she patches a phone call through to her boss. To her surprise, Xander's not talking about the case - rather, he's talking dirty with phone sex operator Nicolette Shea. The sneaky Madison trails him down to the sixth floor, where she discovers the wild world of 1-800-Phone-Sex.
title: 1-800PhoneSEX-2
